titles.title: Debt Crisis Resolution Act of 2011
To cancel public debt held by the Federal Reserve System and to lower the public debt limit by an equal amount.
Debt Crisis Resolution Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Debt Crisis Resolution Act of 2011 - Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to cancel all federal public debt obligations held by the Federal Reserve System.
